name: Germ Squashers
overview:
Children's Hospital has been invaded by nasty bacteria and viruses and the doctors need your help to clean things up! Join young Cesar and Britanny as they arm themselves with vital lifesaving medicine and attack those nasty germs head on. Be careful of bacteria with their stretchy flagellum and the highly contagious viruses that spread their disease around the surfaces of the hospital. Get together with a friend and team up to take them down, or play solo as the character of your choice. It's up to you to make the hospital safe again!!

8bit Evolution is teaming up with Children's Miracle Network and the local Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh in order to bring this release to public. Proceeds from the sales of Germ Squashers will be donated to the Children's Miracle Network to continue to improve care for children when they need it most. Also, this game will be given to Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh to be used in play areas within the hospital to entertain the children and show them the importance of medical treatment in order to handle diseases and infection.
